column4: Is there a good application I can use to organize a large number of videos? Like how rhythmbox is for audio files. is there a video library application?
you can use miro. It does a prity good job, also downloads internet videos from youtube I think. http://www.getmiro.com/
hmmm, I'll see there is a .deb for it...
here is a deb from getdebs: http://www.getdeb.net/app/Miro
